summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Residential Code, amending Section 22.150.010, and adopting by reference Chapters 2 through 10, 12 through 24, 44, and Appendices F and G of the 2009 International Residential Code, and amending certain of those chapters; adopting a new Chapter 1 related to administration, permitting and enforcement; and repealing Sections 2 -15 of Ordinance 122533 and Sections 1-9 of Ordinance 122774.
